title: Simulation-Based Team Collaboration Training: Applications in Scientific Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Team-based simulation training in smartphone-centric limited technology environments. Focus on improving collaboration skills by recreating scientific problem-solving processes through virtual scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can communicate effectively with team members in simulations that replicate real-world scientific problem scenarios.
Learners can analyze team performance with over 80% accuracy using a simulation assessment tool (VAS-based survey).
Learners can apply at least three collaboration strategies when solving science-related problems within two weeks of training.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
